text: Jorge Pedro Zabalza Waksman (30 November 1943 â€“ 23 February 2022) was a Uruguayan politician and writer. He was a former leader within the political organization Tupamaros. He was president of the Junta Departamental de Montevideo. Zabalza died in Montevideo, Uruguay on 23 February 2022 from oesophageal cancer, aged 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Uruguay Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:Uruguayan politicians Category:Uruguayan writers
title: Jorge Zabalza
